name: PeerMe MultiSig: Propose Transfer Execute EGLD
title: Propose EGLD transfer and execution
description: Create a proposal to transfer EGLD from the MultiSig wallet and optionally execute a smart contract function. This allows the MultiSig to send funds and interact with other contracts. The proposal requires quorum approval before execution.

inputs.name: Recipient Address
inputs.description: The wallet address to send EGLD to.

inputs.name: EGLD Amount
inputs.description: The amount of EGLD to transfer (in wei, will be scaled by 18 decimals).

inputs.name: Gas Limit
inputs.description: Optional gas limit for the execution (leave empty for default).

inputs.name: Function Call
inputs.description: Optional function call data (hex encoded bytes).

messages.success: Proposal created successfully. Action ID: {{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}}. The proposal to transfer {{EGLD_AMOUNT_FORMATTED}} EGLD is now awaiting signatures.

label.en: Get notified when this proposal is signed
label.de: Benachrichtigung erhalten, wenn dieser Vorschlag unterzeichnet wird

body.en: A board member has signed proposal #{{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}} to transfer {{EGLD_AMOUNT_FORMATTED}} EGLD
body.de: Ein Vorstandsmitglied hat Vorschlag #{{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}} zur Übertragung von {{EGLD_AMOUNT_FORMATTED}} EGLD unterzeichnet
